  2. Classes and Interfaces

Package bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.commands

package bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.commands
  • Class
    Description
    AddBooking
     
    AddCustomer
     
    AddFlight
    Command to add a new flight to the flight booking system.
    CancelBookingInMemory
    Command to cancel a booking and store the cancelled booking in memory.
    CancelBookings
    Command to cancel and remove a booking for a specific customer and flight.
    Command
    Represents a command that can be executed within the flight booking system.
    EditBookings
    Command to edit an existing booking by its booking ID.
    Help
    Command to display the help message with all available commands.
    InputUtils
    Utility class providing methods to safely read and validate user inputs from a BufferedReader.
    InteractiveBookings
    Command implementation that facilitates interactive flight booking via console input.
    ListBookings
    Command implementation that lists bookings in the flight booking system.
    ListCustomers
    Command implementation that lists customers registered in the flight booking system.
    ListFlights
    Command implementation to list flights available in the flight booking system.
    LoadGUI
    Command implementation to launch the graphical user interface (GUI) of the flight booking system.
    Rebook
     
    RemoveCustomer
    Command to remove a customer and all their associated bookings from the system.
    RemoveFlight
    Command to remove a flight and all its associated bookings from the system.
    SearchFlight
    Command to search flights based on multiple criteria such as origin, destination, departure date range, airline, and flight status.
    ShowBookings
    The ShowBookings command is responsible for displaying all booking information associated with a specific customer.
    ShowCustomer
    The ShowCustomer command displays the main details and booking history of a customer identified by a given customer ID.
    ShowFlight
    Command to show full details of a flight by its ID.
    UpdateCustomer
    The UpdateCustomer command allows updating an existing customer's personal details such as name, phone, passport info, etc., using their ID.
    UpdateFlight
    The UpdateFlight class implements the Command interface and allows for updating the details of an existing flight in the system.
